tool_description: A Collection of Mutawatir (Mass transmitted) Hadith (prophetic traditions)
title: Mutawatir-Hadith-API

api_list.name: Get hadith by id
api_list.description: Each hadith have a unique ID. These ID can be used to get the hadith
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mutawatir-hadith-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadith/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mutawatir-hadith-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all hadith
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mutawatir-hadith-api.p.rapidapi.com/allHadith"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mutawatir-hadith-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
